page.title: 16Royston Civic Hall (Cont.)
page.content:
In the entrance hall there is a Public Phone,Office, Toilets and Reading Room.The Reading Room is suitably used as a cloakroom for large functions as it can be closed off from other areas. Children's experience of the Hall:_ "My Grandma goes to the Darby & Joan club every Thursday."_ Sarah age 8yrs.
"When I was 4yrs.old I went to the Play School at the Civic Hall." Benjamin age 8yrs.
"My Dad and Grandad are Miners.During the strike we all had our free meals at the Civic Hall."- Adele age 9yrs.
"Parties are held at the Civic Hall every year for relatives of anyone who works at Royston Drift Mine" _ Darren age 9yrs.
